data.title: Facebook, Microsoft, Twitter, and Google to Fight Coronavirus Misinformation Together
data.text: The big tech companies have a shot at doing good for society by curbing the flow of misinformation on their platforms. They are now joining forces in the effort.

data.title: Facebook, Twitter, Google and other tech giants join forces to fight coronavirus fake news
data.text: Technology giants including Facebook, Twitter, Google GOOG, -11.10%  and YouTube have joined forces to fight fraud and misinformation over the coronavirus pandemic and push official guidance on their platforms.
